document_data.name: {{PAGENAME}}
document_data.mainbody: '''{{PAGENAME}}''' was the chatelaine of the [[Flying Stag]] inn located in [[Voonlar]] as of the [[1372 DR|Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR]].{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|22}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 17: A Place to Stay}}
document_data.Description: Valladonra was short with a gamine figure, and was judged one of the most beautiful women in Voonlar.
document_data.Personality: She had energy to spare and was in constant motion while supervising the staff and catering to guests. She was a romantic and thought that lovers would appreciate the privacy offered by the Flying Stag.
document_data.Relationships: Toward her husband, [[Hlarvo Dluthree|Hlarvo]], she was sometimes a bit shrewish.
